metadata.title: Information Ministry appoints Khaleeq Ansari as spokesperson for Sindh

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 13 (APP): The Ministry of Information and Broadcasting on Friday appointed Raja Khaleeq uz Zaman Ansari as a spokesperson for the Sindh province. The ministry has issued a notification to this end, said a news release. Federal Minister for Information and Broadcasting Attaullah Tarar approved the appointment of Raja Khaleeq uz Zaman Ansari for the assignment. His appointment is on honorary basis.
